ARABIC: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ أَمْرُنَا نَجَّيْنَا هُودًا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍ مِّنَّا وَنَجَّيْنَٰهُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ غَلِيظٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When Our command came, We rescued Hud and those who had iman along with him by a mercy from Us. We rescued them from a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, when Our command was issued We rescued Hud by Our grace, and those who believed, with him, and saved them from a dreadful doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And when Our com-mand came to pass, We delivered Hud, together with those who shared his faith, out of special mercy from Us. We delivered them from a woeful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When Our decree (of destroying them) was fulfilled, We mercifully saved Hud and his believing followers. We saved them from the intense torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when Our command came, We rescued Hud and the Muslims who were with him, by Our mercy; and We saved them from a severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when Our commandment came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him by a mercy from Us, and We saved them from a severe torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when Our decree came to pass, We delivered Hud and those who believed with him with mercy from Us, and We delivered them from a hard chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when Our command came, We delivered Hood and those who believed with him by a mercy from Us, and delivered them from a harsh chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when Our commandment came to pass We saved Hud and those who believed with him by a mercy from Us; We saved them from a harsh doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When Our command came, We delivered Hud and those who believed with him by Our special mercy. We saved them from a severe punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And then when Our decree came to pass, We delivered Hud and these who believed with him by a mercy from us; and We delivered them: from a torment rough.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When Our edict came, We delivered Hud and the faithful who were with him, by a mercy from Us, and We delivered them from a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So when Our decree issued, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by (special) Grace from Ourselves: We saved them from a severe penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when Our Commandment came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him by a Mercy from Us, and We saved them from a severe torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when Our command came, We saved Hood, together with those who believed with him through Our Mercy, and saved them from a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when Our decree came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by a mercy from Us, and We delivered them from a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when Our command came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us; and We saved them from a harsh punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:58] And when Our command, Our chastisement, came to pass We delivered Hūd and those who believed with him by a mercy, by guidance, from Us, and We delivered them from a harsh, a severe, chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when Our commandment) Our chastisement (came to pass We saved Hud and those who believed with him by a mercy from Us) by a grace from Us; (We saved them from a harsh doom) a severe chastisement.
